entry.title: A3 Thinking
entry.content:

Outline & Show Notes

Chef & Food Fight Updates

  • Join us in the Chef Community Slack
  • New Habitat homepage
  • ChefConf
    • Workshops
  • Training
    • Online training from Linux Academy and udemy
    • Classes - London, San Francisco, Washington DC, Seattle, Chicago, Dublin, Raleigh, Boston, and online.
  • Upcoming Chef Events
    • March 1 - Testing at the Edges webinar
    • March 2-5 - Southern California Linux Expo
    • March 3 - DevOps Automation M4 Meetup
    • March 3 - DevOpsDays Los Angeles
    • March 6-8 - QCon London
    • March 7-8 - DevOpsDays Baltimore
    • March 8 - Hands on with Habitat - London
    • March 8 - Quantifying DevOps Outcomes - Managing Risk webinar
    • March 10 - Crafting Reusable Infrastructure Resources
    • March 13 - Chef Users London Presents "Who owns open source security?"
    • March 14 - FLOSS UK Conference Workshop: Infrastructure as Code
    • March 14 - Hartford Compliance Automation: InSpec + Chef Automate
    • March 15 - Chicago Compliance Automation: InSpec + Chef Automate
    • March 15 - Getting Ready for Chef Client 13 webinar
  • Have topic or guest ideas? Who do you want to hear from? What do you want to hear about?

    • Email us - info@foodfightshow.org

A3 Thinking

  • What is A3?
  • How does it apply to the daily work of IT professionals?
  • How has it impacted your team's outcomes?
